content:
In the last Nordic meeting on standardization arranged by the Nordic Council there were to Action Points regarding FHIR:

AP2: To influence the HL7 with a common Nordic voice. Call for meeting on profiles on a Nordic level
AP3: Collect and share information from each Nordic country and how profiling is performed

We could discuss how we can make an input to these action points in our next call.

Want invitation to the call? PM me with your email address or use espen.stranger.seland@ehelse.no

Hi, there was a call last week with a number of people representing most of the Nordic countries disussing FHIR, decision support and integration with EHRs. The group have planned a new meeting and there was a proposal for meeting a day in connection with HIMSS Europe in Finland next spring. Maybe we can have a short discussion on how we will relate to this group?
@Jens Villadsen Could you do a small presentation of your experiences with IG Publisher?
